title: disconnecting every single game
body: i keep getting disconnected in the pre-game loading screen  not champion select, not the ban faze .but after everyone has locked in and it changes to the seperate screen were everyone gets loaded into game. it happens every single game. and only after i get to 100%. i have tried to reinstall/clean uninstall/and initiate a full repair, none of it worked.  its getting so god damb irritating too i allways get the same message  "network warning blah blah blah check your  internet connection"  and im pretty sure if it was my connection it wouldn"t be happening for days  and usually after i reconnect a couple dozen times it lets me play

replies.body: I am experiencing this bug/issue as well.  I basically reach 100% loading, then I get disconnected. I am only able to reconnect once everyone else has loaded into the game. Otherwise, I'll keep receiving the "You have been disconnected" message.

If you've been getting that awkward network error for several days now, yet you can still obviously browse the internet if you were able to post here, it sounds like your network might just be having problems getting connected to our game servers specifically. Let's do a quick trace route using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and have it check the latest network logs. Take a screenshot of what it gives and paste it here so I can look over it with you.

ok, im trying  to use the log reader and i read the instructions but it said it didn't appear to be a netlog  even though it had netlog in the file name 

also i have tried a dozen different ones other then the first one and the same thing happened
same thing as happened to me, lost 40 lp and now got an LB
